name: Amazon+ (UK)
description:
A clean and simple skin to remove a lot of the rubbish from the amazon UK website. Supports a lovely book background, which is easy to change if people desire, a scrolling text centre and all that jazz.

Picture provided by stardeht - deviantart - "http://stardeht.deviantart.com/art/Black-and-White-Library-260488731"
additional_info: 0.1 Release - I still plan on centralising text, and doing some minor changes - but this is significantly better than normal amazon UK. If you have any suggestions, please feel free to let me know!
